thread.title: New Arkansas law would allow guns into Razorbacks' football stadium as soon as 2018
thread.title_full: New Arkansas law would allow guns into Razorbacks' football stadium as soon as 2018

author: Creg Stephenson | cstephenson@al.com
title: New Arkansas law would allow guns into Razorbacks' football stadium as soon as 2018
text: Arkansas Gov. Asa Hutchinson on Wednesday signed into law HB1249, which allows concealed weapons into public buildings. That includes Reynolds Razorbacks Stadium and Bud Walton Arena, the school's basketball facility.
